IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT

Camellia/Camellian except RN11SE is nearing EOL. This means no updates at all from Xiaomi after April. 
Our kernel is still 4.14 and Android has discontinued support for this version. WE NEED YOU to spam MI Open Source repository issues sections with RESPECTFUL requests to either update the kernel or fix the source. IT SHOULD BE RESPECTFUL AND CAN BE DONE IN BOTH CHINESE AND ENGLISH.
This is our last chance for further development for this device, we want all of you do it if you want further development for camellia.
Android 14 QPR2 already doesn't boot on Kernel 4.14.

https://github.com/MiCode/Xiaomi_Kernel_OpenSource

all_roms.maintainer: crowdfunding the necessary resources. Please send as much as you are able to provide to us.
all_roms.raw_text:
Dear Camellia/n community, 

This is a serious note from camellian development team

Due to recent events like EoL, and no kernel source, many of our developers have left development for this phone... , 

The developers that are still with us, are currently struggling with servers that are needed to build ROMs, they are very expensive and the prices are only going up..
That's why we need YOU to help our developers by crowdfunding the necessary resources. Please send as much as you are able to provide to us.

We are sad to announce that if we don't get the necessary resources this device will unfortunately be officially and unofficially EoL.


Additionally, if we raise enough money we will be able to continue with the work on the kernel source, which Xiaomi by law has to release publicly, but they of course didn't..
That's why we have to build it from scratch and that is very hard..


Help us, please and thank You.

International: https://paypal.me/gemerfoxy
Indonesian: PM @naokoshoto for GoPay / Bank Transfer

IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT

Camellia/Camellian except RN11SE is nearing EOL. This means no updates at all from Xiaomi after April. 
Our kernel is still 4.14 and Android has discontinued support for this version. WE NEED YOU to spam MI Open Source repository issues sections with RESPECTFUL requests to either update the kernel or fix the source. IT SHOULD BE RESPECTFUL AND CAN BE DONE IN BOTH CHINESE AND ENGLISH.
This is our last chance for further development for this device, we want all of you do it if you want further development for camellia.
Android 14 QPR2 already doesn't boot on Kernel 4.14.

https://github.com/MiCode/Xiaomi_Kernel_OpenSource

naokos.maintainer: crowdfunding the necessary resources. Please send as much as you are able to provide to us.
naokos.raw_text:
Dear Camellia/n community, 

This is a serious note from camellian development team

Due to recent events like EoL, and no kernel source, many of our developers have left development for this phone... , 

The developers that are still with us, are currently struggling with servers that are needed to build ROMs, they are very expensive and the prices are only going up..
That's why we need YOU to help our developers by crowdfunding the necessary resources. Please send as much as you are able to provide to us.

We are sad to announce that if we don't get the necessary resources this device will unfortunately be officially and unofficially EoL.


Additionally, if we raise enough money we will be able to continue with the work on the kernel source, which Xiaomi by law has to release publicly, but they of course didn't..
That's why we have to build it from scratch and that is very hard..


Help us, please and thank You.

International: https://paypal.me/gemerfoxy
Indonesian: PM @naokoshoto for GoPay / Bank Transfer

IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT

Camellia/Camellian except RN11SE is nearing EOL. This means no updates at all from Xiaomi after April. 
Our kernel is still 4.14 and Android has discontinued support for this version. WE NEED YOU to spam MI Open Source repository issues sections with RESPECTFUL requests to either update the kernel or fix the source. IT SHOULD BE RESPECTFUL AND CAN BE DONE IN BOTH CHINESE AND ENGLISH.
This is our last chance for further development for this device, we want all of you do it if you want further development for camellia.
Android 14 QPR2 already doesn't boot on Kernel 4.14.

Unofficial.maintainer: crowdfunding the necessary resources. Please send as much as you are able to provide to us.
Unofficial.raw_text:
Dear Camellia/n community, 

This is a serious note from camellian development team

Due to recent events like EoL, and no kernel source, many of our developers have left development for this phone... , 

The developers that are still with us, are currently struggling with servers that are needed to build ROMs, they are very expensive and the prices are only going up..
That's why we need YOU to help our developers by crowdfunding the necessary resources. Please send as much as you are able to provide to us.

We are sad to announce that if we don't get the necessary resources this device will unfortunately be officially and unofficially EoL.


Additionally, if we raise enough money we will be able to continue with the work on the kernel source, which Xiaomi by law has to release publicly, but they of course didn't..
That's why we have to build it from scratch and that is very hard..


Help us, please and thank You.

International: https://paypal.me/gemerfoxy
Indonesian: PM @naokoshoto for GoPay / Bank Transfer

Official.maintainer: crowdfunding the necessary resources. Please send as much as you are able to provide to us.
Official.raw_text:
Dear Camellia/n community, 

This is a serious note from camellian development team

Due to recent events like EoL, and no kernel source, many of our developers have left development for this phone... , 

The developers that are still with us, are currently struggling with servers that are needed to build ROMs, they are very expensive and the prices are only going up..
That's why we need YOU to help our developers by crowdfunding the necessary resources. Please send as much as you are able to provide to us.

We are sad to announce that if we don't get the necessary resources this device will unfortunately be officially and unofficially EoL.


Additionally, if we raise enough money we will be able to continue with the work on the kernel source, which Xiaomi by law has to release publicly, but they of course didn't..
That's why we have to build it from scratch and that is very hard..


Help us, please and thank You.

International: https://paypal.me/gemerfoxy
Indonesian: PM @naokoshoto for GoPay / Bank Transfer
